name: Tetrikey
description:
Make your way to the flag by piecing together key fragments into horrible monstrosities. Made for the 2021 GMTK game jam.

  • Arrows or WASD to move
  • Z: Grab / Join key fragments
  • X, C: Rotate your key clockwise or counter-clockwise
  • R: Retry the current level

I brute forced this abomination together using a hand made ECS library built on top of react and redux just to see if I could. It's hilariously inefficient by design and switching / retrying levels hangs for a bit, sorry!
